pages.text: Music Maker brings instruments and musical creativity to Minecraft! $(br2)Craft and play various instruments, compose melodies, and create your own musical masterpieces.
Start by crafting basic instruments like the Piano and Drum. $(br2)Combine musical components to build unique instruments or create your own orchestra!
Compose songs using the in-game composer or simply play your favorite melodies. $(br2)With a variety of sounds, you can bring a whole new dimension of creativity to your Minecraft world.
